name: Deuterium
description: "DAM is a decentralized, global liquidity infrastructure for powering value mobility between sovereign web3 networks. It helps blockchains scale native liquidity and improves capital efficiency across the fragmented digital assets space." d2o is a decentralized multichain stablecoin built to move liquidity wherever users need it through native deployments and teleportation (burn on source chain, mint on destination chain).
